member.name: M:Microsoft.Framework.Logging.ConsoleLoggerExtensions.AddConsole(Microsoft.Framework.Logging.ILoggerFactory)
member.summary: Adds a console logger that is enabled for .Information or higher.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Framework.Logging.ConsoleLoggerExtensions.AddConsole(Microsoft.Framework.Logging.ILoggerFactory,System.Func{System.String,Microsoft.Framework.Logging.LogLevel,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Adds a console logger that is enabled as defined by the filter function.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Framework.Logging.ConsoleLoggerExtensions.AddConsole(Microsoft.Framework.Logging.ILoggerFactory,Microsoft.Framework.Logging.LogLevel)
member.summary: Adds a console logger that is enabled for s of minLevel or higher.
